full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RANG BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA NAG PO CHEN PO'I SGRUB THABS DPAL SHA BA RIS MDZAD PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B RANG BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA NAG PO CHEN PO'I SGRUB THABS DPAL SHA BA RIS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO, ,BSGRUB THABS RGYA GZHUNG 'DI LA YI GE RNYING PA NA MCHAN CHUNG NYAG NYOG MANG PO BSTAN 'DUG NA'ANG, ,DGOS PA LHAG PO CI YANG MI SNANG BAS MA BRIS SO, ,
